column4: hi :) i just installed ubuntu 7.10 on a 3 year old pc of mine ... it is running the gnome desktop by default ... i have a question about gnome ... what terminal application comes with gnome that has a "tabbed multi sessions" feature like konsole in kde ? or what should i grab via synaptic to have that feature?
n.b. i am an ubuntu noobie, not a *nux noob
right click and choose open new tab?
